title: Lance Stroll gives best ever F1 interview: Up/Down 2025 Italian GP
summary: A new F1 star was born at the 2025 Italian GP

qa_pairs.question: Which driver achieved a significant breakthrough in their career at the 2025 Italian GP?
What is the significance of the Italian GP in the F1 calendar?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: It is one of the oldest and most prestigious races.
wrong_options: It features a unique street circuit layout.
It has the highest number of overtakes.

qa_pairs.question: What type of event is the Italian GP classified as in Formula 1?
